intersectiongetter.hh File Reference

Detailed Description

Utilities to get the intersection iterator depending.

Author:
Markus Blatt Depending on whether you work on a leaf or a level you you have to call the methods ilevel{begin,end}() or ileaf{begin,end}() to get the correct iterator.
